channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 13:37 Threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community has been eliminated. Stay tuned for further updates.
item.description: 🟢 13:37 Threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community has been eliminated. Stay tuned for further updates. #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🟠 10:00 FREE EVACUATION We ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for civilian evacuation - 0800339291
